column3: Verify the respose of the "tacticvalidation" API. ("success")
column9:
Given Execute test case po_sanity 01
        When I set api endpoint to tactic_validation
            And Set the body of request
            And Perform post
        Then Validate HTTP response code
            And Validate error
            And Validate success

column3: Verify the respose of the "tactic" API. ("success")

Create a tactic 
validate on tactic overview
turn off the tactic

turn on the tactic 
validate on tactic overview
delete the created tactic
